result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald J Hecht

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerked by SM. 
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CM70, 15CF79, 15CF96, 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197, 15CF198, 15CF284, 15CF285
Summary provided by State. 
Court questions Defendant.  
15CM70 - Count 1 - Defendant pleads guilty.  Court accepts plea and finds guilty.  Counts 2 & 3 - dismissed and read-in.
15CF79 - State moves to amend Count 1 to misdemeanor battery - 940.19(1) with domestic abuse enhancer.  Court grants amendment to count 1 with the domestic abuse enhancer.  Defendant pleads guilty, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in count 2.
15CF96 - Entire case dismissed and read-in.  Defense has no objection to using cash bond posted towards restitution in other cases.  Court orders $1,000.00 posted be applied to restitution in other cases.
15CF195 Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds defendant guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in  counts 2 - 6.  Court orders $2,500.00 cash bond be posted to be used first to restitution in any case.
15CF196 & 15CF197 - Entire cases dismissed and read-in.
15CF198 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1 & 2, Court accepts and finds guilty of both counts.
15CF284 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads-in counts 2 -4.
15CF285 - Entire case is dismissed and read-in.
Eau Claire County read-in to be filed in 15CF198.  Court dismisses and reads in Eau Claire County case 15CM1013.
Barron County uncharged read-ins on summary sheet, restitution will be ordered. 
Court revokes bond.  PSI ordered on felony cases only.  15CM70 will be sentenced at same time as felony cases.
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Clerked by CS
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 15CM70, 15CF79, 15CF96, 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197, 15CF198, 15CF284 and 15CF285.

15CF284: Defendant waives formal reading of Information and pleads NG to all counts.
15CF285: Defendant waives formal reading of Information and pleads NG to all counts.

15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197 and 15CF198: Defendant waives formal reading in all files of Information and pleads NG to all counts.

All cases set for plea on 9/11/15 at 11:30 a.m. for 30 minutes.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Rachel Payne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM70, 15CF96, 15CF79, 15CF196, 15CF198, 15CF195, 15CF197

No agreement yet.
All above reset.
Bond(s) to continue.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Clerked by AP.
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF79, 15CF96 AND 15CM70

No agreement yet.
All above set for 6/22/15 at 2:00 PM
Bond(s) to continue.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Ronald J Hecht
Current: 1374 8th Ave, Barron, WI 54812 United States  (Effective: 03-25-2015)
Prior: 1148 12th Street, Barron, WI 54812

Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF79, 15CF96 and 15CM70 called.  Attorney Sutton requests bond modification.  State relates.  Court orders bond modified to allow contact with Becky Hammann to arrange child visitation with Maggie Hecht.
15CF79 Arraignment - Information filed - No objection to timeliness - Reading waived - Not guilty plea entered.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant waives preliminary hearing.  The Court waiver is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given.  Court finds probable cause and binds over - Information filed - Not guilty plea entered.  Plea hearing scheduled for March 25, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton (telephonically).  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Sutton was not advised of this hearing. Reset.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 5, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.  
Must have no contact with the Farm & Fleet in Rice Lake, WI.

Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond for today.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives formal reading. Attorney Sutton appointed on Defendant's other files.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
